item.title: Ending the H-1B Visa Lottery Is a Good Step
item.description: Our immigration policies should align with our nation’s interests.

item.title: The Boys of Summer
item.description: This is baseball practice for my kids, but something else for me.

item.title: Trump Is Right to Point the Finger at Hamas for Gaza Woes
item.description: Hamas has long demonstrated that it is willing to put its own population at risk knowing that the world will always blame Israel.

item.title: No Hope for a NASA Revival
item.description: It’s not just red tape holding back government-funded exploration and innovation. It’s a new cultural pessimism about the future.

item.title: The Hidden Costs of Trump’s Tariffs
item.description: Imposing tariffs diverts resources to lobbying efforts that could have been used for productive purposes.
